Room.Name: In the foyer of a stone building
Room.Description: You find yourself standing at the entrance to a large stone building. Unlike most buildings in the ruins this one has been restored and kept in reasonable condition. Large sticky globs of some fluid line the walls and floors, and a disgusting smell fills the air. To the east and west you can see that the corridor heads towards a pair of balconys overlooking the main entrance here. South of here is a door leading out to the ruins.

Room.Name: In a stone corridor
Room.Description: You are standing within a wide stone hallway. There are large pools of ichor and fluids on the walls and floors. A horrible smell permeates the air and threatens to choke you. To the east you can see the corridor leading to the entrance of the building, while west the corridor turns towards a large balcony that overlooks the entrance.

Room.Name: A bend in the stone corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide stone corridor of what appears to be a recently restored building. The sticky ichor that clings to the walls of the building is very thick here, almost like it was smothered onto the walls. To the north you can see a staircase heading up to a balcony. The corridor itself heads back east.

Room.Name: Beneath a wide staircase
Room.Description: You are standing beneath a wide stairwell made of wood. It appears to be a new feature of the building, replacing the older stone steps that had been destroyed with the rest of Myth Drannor.

Room.Name: In a stone corridor
Room.Description: You are standing within a wide stone hallway. There are large pools of ichor and fluids on the walls and floors. A horrible smell permeates the air and threatens to choke you. The corridor heads east and west.

Room.Name: A bend in the stone corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide stone corridor of what appears to be a recently restored building. The sticky ichor that clings to the walls of the building is very thick here, almost like it was smothered onto the walls. To the north you can see a staircase heading up to a balcony. The corirdor itself heads back west.

Room.Name: Beneath a wide staircase
Room.Description: You are standing beneath a wide stairwell made of wood. It appears to be a new feature of the building, replacing the older stone steps that had been destroyed with the rest of Myth Drannor. Sticky ichor drips from the stairs and hangs heavily from the roof. Above you there are faint sounds of something breathing hard.

Room.Name: On a recently built wooden balcony
Room.Description: You are standing on a recently constructed platform overlooking the main entrance to this building. Your feet make SQUELCHing sounds as you step in the thick, sticky ichor and gore that clings to the floor. There is an almost overwhelming stench of something putrid in the air. The balcony heads west to an alcove, or back down.

Room.Name: An alcove overlooking the main entrance
Room.Description: You stand in wide alcove overlooking the building's entranec. From here it is easy to see any intruders who may enter. There is a huge pool of sticky fluids and green ichor on the floor and dripping from the walls here. The only exit appears to be back east along the balcony.

Room.Name: On a recently built wooden balcony
Room.Description: You are standing on a recently constructed platform overlooking the main entrance to this building. Your feet make SQUELCHing sounds as you step in the thick, sticky ichor and gore that clings to the floor. There is an almost overwhelming stench of something putrid in the air. The balcony heads east to an alcove with some stairs leading up, or back down to the main entrance place.

Room.Name: An alcove overlooking the main entrance
Room.Description: You stand in wide alcove overlooking the building's entrance. From here it is easy to see any intruders who may enter. There are huge pools of sticky fluids on the floor and green ichor dripps from the walls. The balcony heads back west. A stairwell heads up to the second floor where you can hear heavy ghastly breathing and disgusting suction sounds.

Room.Name: On a wide stairwell
Room.Description: You are standing at the top of a wide stairwell. The stone walls around you are covered in sticky gore and the air is almost unbreathable. Something truly disgusting has been living in the building and the air reeks of it's prescence. A decaying stone corridor heads south into the building's second floor where you can hear the sounds of awful sucking and breathing.

Room.Name: In a stone corridor
Room.Description: You are walking down a wide corridor made of rough hewn stone. The most immediate aspect of the region is the terrible stench of some disgusting creature. On the floor and walls are large sticky masses of slime and gore. A pair of alcoves are to the east and west, while the corridor heads north and south.

Room.Name: In a stone corridor
Room.Description: You are walking down a wide corridor made of rough hewn stone. The most immediate aspect of the region is the terrible stench of some disgusting creature. On the floor and walls are large sticky masses of slime and gore. A pair of alcoves are to the east and west, while the corridor heads north and south.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You are in a large alcove in the stone building. The walls are packed with gross slime and fluids from some unspeakable beast. Burnt and mangled corpses of some unidentifiable creatures litter the floor. There is very little else other than the overwhelming smell of putrid decay. The alcove heads back east to the corridor.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You are in a large alcove in the stone building. The walls are packed with gross slime and fluids from some unspeakable beast. Burnt and mangled corpses of some unidentifiable creatures litter the floor. There is very little else other than the overwhelming smell of putrid decay. The alcove heads back east to the corridor.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You are in a large alcove in the stone building. The walls are packed with gross slime and fluids from some unspeakable beast. Burnt and mangled corpses of some unidentifiable creatures litter the floor. There is very little else other than the overwhelming smell of putrid decay. You can only head back west to the corridor.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You are in a large alcove in the stone building. The walls are packed with gross slime and fluids from some unspeakable beast. Burnt and mangled corpses of some unidentifiable creatures litter the floor. There is very little else other than the overwhelming smell of putrid decay. The only exit is back west to the corridor.

Room.Name: Bottom of a wide stairwell
Room.Description: You are standing at the southern end of a wide stone corridor. Sticky green fluids and ichor drip off the walls and an awful stench reeks in the air. A wide, slime encrusted stairwell heads up into the building.

Room.Name: On a large stairwell in a building
Room.Description: You are standing on a large, wide stone stariwell. The steps are slippery and slick with strange green ichor and thick sticky slime. Heavy breathing and disgusting sounds of eating can be heard echoing all around you. There are small alcoves in the stairwell in all directions, while the stairs themselves head up and down.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You find yourself in a small chamber off of the stairwell heading up and down in the building. Putrid, decayed corpses of some unidentifiable creatures lie upon the floor and smaller body parts are stuck in the slime and ichor clinging to the walls. You can only go south to the stairwell.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You find yourself in a small chamber off of the stairwell heading up and down in the building. Putrid, decayed corpses of some unidentifiable creatures lie upon the floor and smaller body parts are stuck in the slime and ichor clinging to the walls. You can go west to the stairwell.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You find yourself in a small chamber off of the stairwell heading up and down in the building. Putrid, decayed corpses of some unidentifiable creatures lie upon the floor and smaller body parts are stuck in the slime and ichor clinging to the walls. The only exit is north to the stairwell.

Room.Name: In a beholder's alcove
Room.Description: You find yourself in a small chamber off of the stairwell heading up and down in the building. Putrid, decayed corpses of some unidentifiable creatures lie upon the floor and smaller body parts are stuck in the slime and ichor clinging to the walls. The only exit is east to the stairwell.

Room.Name: At the top of a wide stairwell
Room.Description: You are standing at the northern end of a wide stone corridor. Sticky green fluids and ichor drip off the walls and an awful stench reeks in the air. A wide, slime encrusted stairwell heads down into a dark stairwell. To the south you can hear muted sucking sounds and heavy wet breathing.

Room.Name: In a slime encrusted corridor
Room.Description: The corridor here is filled with thick warm mucus and green bile. It looks like dozens of huge mouths have been drooling their saliva onto the floor and walls for days on end. There is also an almost deadening stench of something vile and despicable. The corridor heads north to some wide stairs or south to a doorway.

Room.Name: Outside a huge iron door
Room.Description: You are standing at the southern end of a slimy, disgusting corridor in the stone building. Wisps of steaming green mist rise from the slime that lies on the floor, indicating that it is very fresh and warm. A huge ornate iron door has been set into the east wall, and you can make out belaboured breathing of some horrible beasts on the other side. The corridor itself heads back north.

Room.Name: SW corner of the Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate. There is a large iron door in the west wall, and the hall heads of north and east.

Room.Name: Southern end of the Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: SE corner of the Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: Western Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: Central Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: Eastern Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: Western Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: Central Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: Easter Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: NW corner of the Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: Northern end of the Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate.

Room.Name: NE corner of the Beholder Corps hall
Room.Description: You stand within a massive open hall. The stone walls of the building have been broken down between the individual rooms up here and cleared away in order to provide a single huge, open area. Green warm gas fills the air as it rises in stinking clouds from the mucus and slime pooling on the floor. Large globs of ichor drip off the ceiling and onto you, causing burning and itching. All around you the sounds of heavy breathing and rumbling voices echo and revererate. To the east is an elaborate golden door.

Room.Name: The Inner Chamber
Room.Description: You are in th dangerous inner chamber of the beholder corps' main level. Here there is very little to see but blank walls, there beholders preferring to indulge themsleves in amusements not seen in the mortal realm. There is a golden door in the west wall, and the chambers continue east.

Room.Name: The Inner Chamber
Room.Description: You are in th dangerous inner chamber of the beholder corps' main level. Here there is very little to see but blank walls, there beholders preferring to indulge themsleves in amusements not seen in the mortal realm. There is a single ebon door in the south wall, or you can head west through the chambers.

Room.Name: The Chamber of Xanath
Room.Description: You stand in the blank but foreboding room of the Myth Drannor beholder Corps' current beholder leader. It is rather bland, but then beholder's see things that mortals don't and there is probably more to the room than meets the eye. An ebon door heads north, or you can climb some stairs up.

Room.Name: On a wide stairwell
Room.Description: You stand at the head of a large staircase heading down. The walls here are cleaner than those in the rest of the building and the stench of beholder excretions is not so strong in the air. To the north the building opens into a crossroads of corridors.

ExtraDescription.Description: The paintings and inscriptions are all related to the power of the dark elf enclaves and houses. They seem to be asserting the drow power and making sure it is being acknowledged here with the beholder corps.

Room.Name: A junction in the cleared corridors
Room.Description: You are in a corridor of the old building that seems better restored and kept than the majority of the region. The air still has the foul stench that fills the area, but it is not so strong here. Some inscriptions and paintings of dark elven people adorn the walls along the corridor. The junction here goes north, east and west, or south towards some stairs heading down.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off east and west.

Room.Name: A bend in a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north and west.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north and south, while plain wooden door are set into the east and west walls.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north and south, while plain wooden door are set into the east and west walls.

Room.Name: A bend in a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the south and west. To the east is a large stairwell leading up.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the east and west.

Room.Name: A junction in the corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the east, south and west.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the east and west.

Room.Name: A bend in a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the east and south. There is a large stairwell to the west.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north and south, while plain wooden door are set into the east and west walls.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north and south, while plain wooden door are set into the east and west walls.

Room.Name: A bend in a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north amd east.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the east and west.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north and south, while plain wooden door are set into the east and west walls.

Room.Name: In a wide cleaned corridor
Room.Description: You are in a wide cleared out corridor in the restored beholder building. The walls and floor are much cleaner than in the rest of the building, and the foul stench of beholder excretions is not so strong here. The corridor heads off to the north and south, while plain wooden door are set into the east and west walls.

Room.Name: Beneath a large stairwell
Room.Description: There is a strong odour of disgusting beholder excretions blowing in from the area above the stairs. Down here the stench is not so strong and the corridors seem to have been cleaned of the sticky green saliva like mess. The stairs go up or you can head east into the corridors.

Room.Name: Beneath a large stairwell
Room.Description: There is a strong odour of disgusting beholder excretions blowing in from the area above the stairs. Down here the stench is not so strong and the corridors seem to have been cleaned of the sticky green saliva like mess. The stairs go up or you can head west into the corridors.

Room.Name: Above a large stairwell
Room.Description: You are standing at the top of a stairwell amidst a virtual lake of disgusting beholder excretions. The stench from here is overwhelming and you can barely breath as it rises around you in steaming wafts. To the east is a large open space that almost looks like it's a pool of exrection and waste. The stairwell leads back down.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. You can see a stairwell to the west.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. The halls head east, south and west.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. You can see a stairwell to the east.

Room.Name: Above a large stairwell
Room.Description: You are standing at the top of a stairwell amidst a virtual lake of disgusting beholder excretions. The stench from here is overwhelming and you can barely breath as it rises around you in steaming wafts. To the west is a large open space that almost looks like it's a pool of exrection and waste. The stairwell leads back down.

Room.Name: In a well furnished room
Room.Description: This room has all the trappings of a lords bedroom. It is spacious and very expensively decorated. It looks like something other than just foul beholder beasts live in this tower. There is a door in the west wall leading out to the corridors.

Room.Name: In a dark room of arcana power
Room.Description: This room has the feel of supressed violence and magical forces waiting to be released. Despite the vileness of the room there is something almost making you feel in awe of the power that is building up in here. The only exit out of the room is to the west through a door.

Room.Name: In a bare room filled with rubble
Room.Description: This room hasn't been restored like the rest of the building. There is a pile of rock and debris dumped in here, indicating that much of the clean up ended up being deposited in this room rather than carried all the way outside. There is a door in the east wall leading out into the corridors.

Room.Name: The prisoner's room
Room.Description: This bare room is mostly filled with rocks and derbis left over from the clean up of the building. Some strong manacles hang off the west wall and pools of thick blood and torn black fur are scattered around the room.

Room.Name: In a bare room filled with rubble
Room.Description: This room hasn't been restored like the rest of the building. There is a pile of rock and debris dumped in here, indicating that much of the clean up ended up being deposited in this room rather than carried all the way outside. There is a door in the east wall leading out into the corridors.

Room.Name: In a bare room filled with rubble
Room.Description: This room hasn't been restored like the rest of the building. There is a pile of rock and debris dumped in here, indicating that much of the clean up ended up being deposited in this room rather than carried all the way outside. There is a door in the east wall leading out into the corridors.

Room.Name: In a bare room filled with rubble
Room.Description: This room hasn't been restored like the rest of the building. There is a pile of rock and debris dumped in here, indicating that much of the clean up ended up being deposited in this room rather than carried all the way outside. There is a door in the west wall leading out into the corridors.

Room.Name: In a slime encrusted room
Room.Description: The room is totally drenched in the foul smelling liquids of beholder drool. There is nothing in the room untouched by the sticky green substance, and you can barely see through the steaming mist rising from the warm mess. There is a door leading west into the clean aired corridors.

Room.Name: A stone filled room
Room.Description: The room is filled with stones and rubble of all size. The rocks here are in a very ordered fashion, set up almost as if being used as furniture. There is a door leading east out to the corridor.

Room.Name: A room of foul smelling vapours
Room.Description: This room is filled with the smell of disgusting beholder matter. There is little of real interest in it however, and you can barely breathe while in here. The best way out is the door in the east wall.

Room.Name: In a bare room filled with rubble
Room.Description: This room hasn't been restored like the rest of the building. There is a pile of rock and debris dumped in here, indicating that much of the clean up ended up being deposited in this room rather than carried all the way outside. There is a door in the west wall leading out into the corridors.

Room.Name: In a bare room filled with rubble
Room.Description: This room hasn't been restored like the rest of the building. There is a pile of rock and debris dumped in here, indicating that much of the clean up ended up being deposited in this room rather than carried all the way outside. There is a door in the west wall leading out into the corridors.

Room.Name: The Dark Room
Room.Description: This room is dark, with no lights at all within it. It is like some kind of shrine to the night. The only thing you can see of interest is a lage iron door in the north wall.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. The halls head north, east and south.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. The halls in all directions around you.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. The halls head north, south and west.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. The halls head north and east.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. The halls head north, east and west. To the south is a large iron door.

Room.Name: In a hall of beholders
Room.Description: You stand ankle deep in the sticky green excretions of a massive number of beholders. The room is filled with thick steaming gas as it rises from the mess on the floor, and you find it hard to breath. All around you there is the sick sound of heavy laboured breathing. The halls head north and west.

NPC.name: beholder
NPC.description: The beholder resembles a massive ball of scabby flesh with a massive mouth that drools and drips mucus. A huge central eye above the mouth swivels to watch you in interest, and it's ten smaller eyes attached to stalks around it's body twist and turn.
NPC.longDescription: A beholder with a huge gaping mouth and writhing eye stalks is here.

NPC.name: xanath beholder
NPC.longDescription: A massive beholder rolls it's eye stalks and floats towards you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: greater beholder
NPC.longDescription: A huge beholder drools mucus as it turns it's eyes upon you in hatred.

NPC.name: priest man
NPC.description: This is the Zhentil Cleric acting as the go-between for the Beholder Corps here in Myth Drannor and the main zhentarim forces. Right now he seems very nervous and anxious about something.
NPC.longDescription: A tall human in black robes is standing here waiting for something.

NPC.name: drow emissary warrior dark-elf
NPC.description: This drow warrior has been sent to deliver a message to the beholders in order to arrange a truce between them and the drow. She seems very scared and is casting furtive glances at the massive beholders that float around the halls.
NPC.longDescription: A dark-skinned elven warrior glances around herself in fear.

NPC.name: beast eye gazer
NPC.description: This minor beholder-kin is one of the lesser types used for guard duty. It has a very small brain and no real motivation other than to eat and digest it's food into mucus that it secretes in order to provide incubating material for the greater beholders.
NPC.longDescription: A beast a huge eye hovers in the air watching you and dribbling.

NPC.name: drow dark-elf elf trader
NPC.description: This drow has followed the path that many individuals or all races do and seeks to make his fortune by selling to the highest bidders. He has no scruples and cares nothing about where his wares go, and has even gone as far as to offer trade with the beholders, who currently are in contest with the drow over the ruins.
NPC.longDescription: A dark elf in rich clothes stands here counting his money.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak

NPC.name: drow dark-elf elf warrior guard
NPC.description: This drow is assigned to watch over the drow emissaries here in the beholder corps tower. He has the eyes of a nervous and distrusting guard, one who places little faith in the beholder's watching eyes.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful looking dark skinned elf is here sharpening his blades.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared Sneak Haste

NPC.name: rakshasa prisoner
NPC.description: This rakshasa has been captured by drow and presented as a show of power and common enemy to the beholder.
NPC.longDescription: A bloody and dying black rakshasa is lying here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: drow dark-elf necromancer elf
NPC.description: The drow necromancer is here as a sign of the drow's power and as a way of intimidating the beholder corps into accepting the drow enclaves as part of the new Myth Drannor that is to arise.
NPC.longDescription: A figure cloaked in heavy black robes and a darkened hood slowly chants.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak

NPC.name: beholder lord
NPC.description: This ancient lord of the beholder's lives in this room, barely able to maintain it's own functions let alone rule the powerful Corps that is forming in the ruins.
NPC.longDescription: A massive but ashen gray beholder regards you with a half closed eye.

NPC.name: stone giant lord
NPC.description: The beholder's have invited the lord of the local stone giants to reside here in the tower as a token effort of truce. The sheer physical power of the giants is enough to make even the beholders wary, as only physical force is what they are scared of.
NPC.longDescription: A massive giant with skin like grey rock is here.

NPC.name: elite beholder
NPC.description: This huge beholder is the elite of the Corps, more disciplined than the lesser ones who have yet to control their bloodlust.
NPC.longDescription: A huge beholder floats vigilantly in the air scanning all around.

NPC.name: manshoon human
NPC.description: This is Manshoon, the First Priest of the ancient god Bane. With the coming of age of Myth Drannor he has taken over the beholder Corps in order to be the first to greet the great power that will be unleashed when the Black tower is finally breached. His stance is arrogant and he has the power to back it, be very wary of him indeed.
NPC.longDescription: A human in black robes stands here bathed in an aura of darkness.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior AreaAttack

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: The petrified corpse of a rakshasa is here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: A mangled beholder corpse is lying here in a pool of blood.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: The blasted remains of a rakshasa corpse is here.

Item.Name: eye beholder
Item.LongDescription: A huge bloody eye lies in a puddle of it's own blood.

Item.Name: leather spiked flail
Item.LongDescription: A tangle of wickedly spiked leather stands lie here.

Item.Name: zhentil black robes
Item.ShortDescription: the black robes of a Zhentil priest
Item.LongDescription: A mass of blackened robes with arcane signs of darkness lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Dark Evil Magic NoDrop Bless AntiGood AntiNeutral

ExtraDescription.Description: The robes are covered in the symbols of the lord of darkness and hum softly with the power imbued upon them by the high priests of the Zhentil order.

Item.Name: beholder eyestalk flesh
Item.LongDescription: A large eye hanging by bloody strands off a stump of flesh is here.

Item.Name: beholder eyestalk flesh
Item.LongDescription: A large eye hanging by bloody strands off a stump of flesh is here.

Item.Name: beholder eyestalk flesh
Item.LongDescription: A large eye hanging by bloody strands off a stump of flesh is here.

Item.Name: iron key
Item.LongDescription: A large iron key is here.

Item.Name: gold key
Item.LongDescription: A large gold key is here.

Item.Name: blue sapphire hilted mace
Item.LongDescription: A deadly looking mace with a dark blue hilt of sapphire is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Dark Evil Magic AntiGood Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: The mace seems to be made of some extermely hard sapphire and there is a harsh glow of dark evil pulsing within it.

Item.Name: belt grey-elven intestines coil flesh
Item.ShortDescription: a belt of dried grey-elven intestines
Item.LongDescription: A coil of gross flesh has been dropped on the ground.

Item.Name: red ioun stone
Item.LongDescription: A red stone hums softly in the air here.

Item.Name: broach spider
Item.LongDescription: A broach in the shape of a large spider is sitting on the ground.

Item.Name: sacrificial knife
Item.LongDescription: A sharp knife coated in dried blood is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks extremely sharp, almost good enough for surgical work, but it is very unwieldly and has little balance for fighting with.

Item.Name: iron key
Item.LongDescription: A shiny iron key is here.

Item.Name: eyestalk
Item.ShortDescription: the bloody eyestalk of a beholder
Item.LongDescription: A large eye hanging by bloody strands off a stump of flesh is here.

Item.Name: stone blub bone crusher bonecrusher
Item.LongDescription: A huge lump of stone in the shape of a club lies here.

Item.Name: burning spiked ring
Item.LongDescription: A spiked ring covered in flickering red flames is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The flames flickering about the ring make it seem almost ethereal. As you watch it the flames spark and flash, tiny points of light hidden between the spikes.

Item.Name: pendant soulbinder
Item.LongDescription: A strange pendant with dark engravings is lying here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral

ExtraDescription.Description: There is something very dark and disturbing about this pendant. The markings on it's surface are of necromantic origin, and they seem to indicate some kind of relationship between the undead and their master.

Item.Name: black arm armguards
Item.LongDescription: Some black armguards are here on the floor.

Item.Name: acid singer scimitar
Item.LongDescription: A huge scimitar dripping with vile acids is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The acid on the blade seems to be seeping out of the very steel itself. There is no indication of how it keeps producing the acid, but it is of an extremely powerful kind.

Item.Name: skin stone
Item.ShortDescription: the skin of a stone giant lord
Item.LongDescription: A large hardened skin of a dead stone giant is here.

Item.Name: opal ring
Item.LongDescription: A large opal ring is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: ivory necklace
Item.LongDescription: A carefully carved piece of ivory on a short chain is here.

Item.Name: orb annihilation
Item.LongDescription: A pitch-black hole in space is floating here in the air.

ExtraDescription.Description: The region of nothingness that this small orb contains is perhaps the most deadly thing in the universe. Anything touching it is destroyed, but only the most powerful of archmages can control such power. It is, however, very slow and it is hard to imagine anything of any reasonable ability being caught by it unless the user were far superior in ability.
